Uses of Interface
fiarautoplayer.LearnStatisticsListener

Packages that use LearnStatisticsListener
fiarautoplayer   
 

Uses of LearnStatisticsListener in fiarautoplayer
 

Classes in fiarautoplayer that implement LearnStatisticsListener
 class LearnStatisticsFileWriter
          Writes learning process statistics to a csv log with the following columns: Game num – game number in learn sequence Winners Color – color of the winner, indicates first (RED) or second player (BLACK) Num of turns – Number of plys the game took Game sequence – space separated integer list representing the moves sequence maxUpdateDelta – the maximal Q error of the sarsa update rule during the game
 

Methods in fiarautoplayer with parameters of type LearnStatisticsListener
 void LearnManager.runLearningSequence(int nGamesToPlay, LearnStatisticsListener sListener)
          this function runs a learning sequence of nGampesToPlay games.
